author: John Doe
title: Great experience with infoblox-nios
Postcontent:
What do you like best about BloxOne DDI?
Great DNS tool and all core network service are centrally managed

What do you dislike about BloxOne DDI?
The license price is very high and the feeds are limited for threat Intel

What problems is BloxOne DDI solving and how is that benefiting you?
Assits us in protecting the DNS service
replyContents: Thank you for your review! We're glad you're enjoying our product.

author: Jane Smith
title: Mixed feelings about infoblox-nios
Postcontent: The infoblox-nios product has good features but the UI needs improvement.
